doc.title: Documentation
doc.description: Gives a json representation of documentation for specified endpoint

endpoint.desc: Endpoint you want documentation for, matches route with stripped slashes

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: Used to get a thumbnail of the uploaded image, maintains aspect ratio, and will default to a max width or height of 200px (whichever is larger).

size.desc: Size (in pixels) of largest edge of image to return

blur/gaussian.title: Gaussian Blur
blur/gaussian.description: Applies a gaussian blur to the image with a specified radius (defaults to 2)

radius.desc: Severity of blur to apply in pixels

blur/box.title: Box Blur
blur/box.description: Applies a box blur to the image with a specified radius (defaults to 10)

radius.desc: Severity of blur to apply in pixels
